distri: As it is the case for most of the songs present in the dataset, the rock of recent years is more represented than the older rock. It can be interpreted in two ways: Either by assuming that the dataset represents the reality, which would mean that rock music becomes more and more popular throughout the years, or, more realistically, it means that the dataset contains more recent music than older one. Observing the global distribution of the songs seems to go in the sense of the second conclusion
Hottness: As for most of the genres, the hotness of the songs increases with the years, as the hotness is a proxy for the listening count of the song. However, we can do an interesting observation in the 60s, as we can see that rock music of this period seems to be more popular than other old rock songs.
